categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The First Platoon of Besh Company in the Second Battalion of the Fifth Infantry was a unit in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. It was stationed on Balmorra, but their attempt to upload viruses into the mainframe of the Okara Droid Factory ended in disaster when droids killed the entire platoon except Lieutenant Rutau.
